title: Using Amazon SageMaker with Amazon Augmented AI for human review of Tabular data and ML predictions
excerpt: Tabular data is a primary method to store data across multiple industries, including financial, healthcare, manufacturing, and many more. A large number of machine learning (ML) use cases deal with traditional structured or tabular data. For example, a fraud detection use case might be tabular inputs
